00035 class CIMDUtil {
00036    public:
00044       static int calcCS(char* message, int length) {
00045          int checksum = 0;
00046          char* p = message;
00047          char* petx = message + length - 1;
00048          
00049          while ( petx - p > 2 ) {
00050             checksum += *p;
00051             checksum &= 0xff;
00052             p++;
00053          }
00054          return checksum;
00055       }
